response.overview: Pamma and Jaggi found a best friend in each other pulling a high school prank. Their friendship went through punishments and memorable moments together. Now, as young college boys, while Pamma cannot stop falling in love with every girl he comes across, Jaggi finds it hard to even confess his feelings to his best friend. Pamma uses Jaggi as his wingman not knowing that Jaggi has secretly been actually making his girlfriends dump him. In all of this friends, fun and games equation, things take an unexpected turn when a girl dumps Pamma right before the wedding and friends are at crossroads.
response.title: Jatt Brothers
